info.title: PolicyClient
info.description: To manage and control access to your resources, you can define customized policies and assign them at a scope.

get.description: This operation retrieves a list of all the built-in policy definitions.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for the operation.

200.description: OK - Returns an array of built-in policy definitions.

get.description: This operation retrieves the built-in policy definition with the given name.

parameters.name: policyDefinitionName
parameters.description: The name of the built-in policy definition to get.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for the operation.

200.description: OK - Returns information about the built-in policy definition.

get.summary: Retrieve policy definitions in a management group
get.description: This operation retrieves a list of all the policy definitions in a given management group.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for the operation.

parameters.name: managementGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the management group.

200.description: OK - Returns an array of policy definitions.

get.summary: Retrieve a policy definition in a management group.
get.description: This operation retrieves the policy definition in the given management group with the given name.

parameters.name: policyDefinitionName
parameters.description: The name of the policy definition to get.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for the operation.

parameters.name: managementGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the management group.

200.description: OK - Returns information about the policy definition.

put.summary: Creates or updates a policy definition in a management group.
put.description: This operation creates or updates a policy definition in the given management group with the given name.

parameters.name: policyDefinitionName
parameters.description: The name of the policy definition to create.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for the operation.

parameters.name: managementGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the management group.

201.description: Created - Returns information about the policy definition.

delete.summary: Deletes a policy definition in a management group.
delete.description: This operation deletes the policy definition in the given management group with the given name.

parameters.name: policyDefinitionName
parameters.description: The name of the policy definition to delete.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for the operation.

parameters.name: managementGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the management group.

get.summary: Retrieves policy definitions in a subscription
get.description: This operation retrieves a list of all the policy definitions in a given subscription.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for the operation.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.

200.description: OK - Returns an array of policy definitions.

get.summary: Retrieves a policy definition in a subscription.
get.description: This operation retrieves the policy definition in the given subscription with the given name.

parameters.name: policyDefinitionName
parameters.description: The name of the policy definition to get.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for the operation.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.

200.description: OK - Returns information about the policy definition.

put.summary: Creates or updates a policy definition in a subscription.
put.description: This operation creates or updates a policy definition in the given subscription with the given name.

parameters.name: policyDefinitionName
parameters.description: The name of the policy definition to create.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for the operation.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.

201.description: Created - Returns information about the policy definition.

delete.summary: Deletes a policy definition in a subscription.
delete.description: This operation deletes the policy definition in the given subscription with the given name.

parameters.name: policyDefinitionName
parameters.description: The name of the policy definition to delete.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for the operation.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.

id.description: The ID of the policy definition.

name.description: The name of the policy definition.

nextLink.description: The URL to use for getting the next set of results.

displayName.description: The display name of the policy definition.

mode.description: The policy definition mode. Some examples are All, Indexed, Microsoft.KeyVault.Data.

parameters.description: Required if a parameter is used in policy rule.

policyType.description: The type of policy definition. Possible values are NotSpecified, BuiltIn, and Custom.

ApiVersionParameter.name: api-version
ApiVersionParameter.description: The API version to use for the operation.

ManagementGroupIdParameter.name: managementGroupId
ManagementGroupIdParameter.description: The ID of the management group.

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: The ID of the target subscription.
